prop.name: videoFormat
prop.desc: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).

prop.name: isLiveBroadcast
prop.desc: True is the broadcast is of a live event.

prop.name: broadcastOfEvent
prop.desc: The event being broadcast such as a sporting event or awards ceremony.

PublicationEvent.name: publishedOn
PublicationEvent.desc: A broadcast service associated with the publication event.

PublicationEvent.name: free
PublicationEvent.desc: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.

PublicationEvent.name: isAccessibleForFree
PublicationEvent.desc: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.
